Title: Get Me A Lawyer
Plot: Attorney Patty Hewes hires a new associate, Ellen Parsons, to help her as she tries to ruin Arthur Frobisher. Hewes represents a group of employees that are suing Frobisher after he sold his company, leaving the employees devastated. Ellen is unaware that her best friend, Katie Connor, is working for Frobisher.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Writer: Todd A. Kessler, Glenn Kessler, Daniel Zelman
GuestStars: Tom Aldredge, Robin Thomas, Victor Arnold, Donnie Keshawarz, Miriam Shor, Saundra Santiago, David Costabile, Joanna Rhinehart, Brian McCormack, Todd A. Kessler, Todd A. Kessler, Letty Serra, Casey Siemaszko, Maya
